description: This file is a plugin configuration for Nuxt.js that sets up Pinia as the store management system by creating a new Pinia instance and installing it into the Vue application.

methods.name: defineNuxtPlugin
methods.description: Defines a Nuxt.js plugin that receives the Nuxt application context and allows for plugin setup

methods.name: createPinia
methods.description: Creates a new Pinia store instance for state management
